app_description:
I-Constitutional App ithuthukiswa yi-  Iyunithi Yokubusa Ngentando Yeningi Namalungelo   we-Faculty of Law, University of Cape Town ngokubambisana ne  AfricanLII   and  Laws.Africa , ngoxhaso lwezimali oluvela ku  Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung . Inhloso yalolu hlelo wukuhlomisa amalungu ephalamende laseNingizimu Afrika ngolwazi olunembayo nolugunyaziwe ngeNingizimu Afrika umthetho womthethosisekelo.

Kulolu hlelo lokusebenza, uzothola inguqulo ebuyekeziwe yaseNingizimu Umthethosisekelo wase-Afrika, kanye nokuphawula kwezimiso zawo ezibalulekile kanye nokuhunyushwa kwazo yizinkantolo eziphakeme zaseNingizimu Afrika. Uhlelo lokusebenza ikuvumela ukuthi upheqa futhi ufunde izifinyezo kanye nokugcwele umbhalo wezinqumo zenkantolo yomthethosisekelo. Okuqukethwe yilokhu uhlelo lokusebenza luyatholakala ungaxhunyiwe ku-inthanethi futhi luzobuyekezwa kabili ngonyaka.
contact_us:
Oxhumana naye

Zizwe ukhululekile ukudlulisa impendulo eyakhayo neziphakamiso ku  info@africanlii.org.
copyright:
I-copyright

Okuqukethwe kwalolu hlelo lokusebenza kunikezwe ilayisense ngaphansi kwe-Attribution-NonCommerce 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0) ilayisensi ye-Creative Commons. Buka i- ilayisense ku  https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/ .
